attributes.action: Deter criminals by making prisons much harsher environmentally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Factually, criminals are found to be more afraid of being caught than the actual time they serve. The problem: comfortable prisons. These places of supposed fear now better resemble hotels. 
Strip prisons of luxuries and make these criminals pay for their law-breaking. By doing this, the idea of detterance would be of greater effectiveness; crime would bear a harsher complexion.
